summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1586, for the improvement of Meridian Avenue, Burke Avenue, Densmore Avenue and Woodlawn Avenue,each from North Fortieth Street to North Fiftieth Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by constructing concrete sidewalks and wood crosswalks, under Ordinance No. 16878 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
